hero.title: BUSINESS KEÑES
hero.desc: BUSINESS KEÑES helps founders find investors, explore new markets, and influence government policy.

about.title: About us
about.lead: We advise ambitious start-ups and experienced entrepreneurs in Kazakhstan who have created a unique product or service and are seeking new markets, potential investors, as well as state support and promotion of their interests in government policies.

principles.quote:
“Trust and reputation worth more than money;
Others can do it - so can we;
There is enough space under the sun for everyone!”

aray.name: Ms. Aray Kasabekova
aray.bio: A trade negotiator with 20 years of experience in Kazakhstan’s Government, she led WTO accession talks and represented the country in negotiations for the Eurasian Economic Union and the EU–Kazakhstan Partnership Agreement. From 2016 to 2019, she served at Kazakhstan’s Permanent Mission in Geneva, representing the nation at the WTO, UNCTAD, and ISO.

roman.name: Mr. Roman Romashkin
roman.bio: An expert with 20 years of experience in trade, economic integration, food security, and agriculture. He has taught and conducted research at Moscow State University for over 15 years and participated in projects with the World Bank, OECD, EU, OXFAM, IFPRI, ICTSD, and UNCTAD/WTO.

saltanat.name: Ms. Saltanat Jambylbek
saltanat.bio: A lawyer with 15 years of experience in corporate, labor, and business law, advising clients on corporate and regulatory matters in Kazakhstan. He has extensive expertise in contracts and legal documentation, with experience at KazTransGas, Nazarbayev University, and the Astana International Financial Center.

asiya.name: Ms. Asiya Ashigaliyeva
asiya.bio: With 18 years in Kazakhstan’s Government, she specializes in trade policy, lawmaking, and international negotiations. She contributed to WTO accession, major trade and investment agreements, and represents Kazakhstan in the OECD Investment Committee.

card1.title: BUSINESS KEÑES joins USAID TPSP Initiative
card1.text: BUSINESS KEÑES is included into the list of consultants of the USAID Central Asia Trade Program’s TPSP Initiative

card2.title: Kazakhstan Oil & Fat Industry Report
card2.text: The Status, Challenges, and Prospects of Kazakhstan's Oil and Fat Industry in the Context of Eurasian Integration

card3.title: Eurasian Agro-Logistics and Transport Corridors
card3.text: International Transport Corridors and Prospects for the Export-Import Agro-Logistics Ecosystem in Russia

footer.lead: Built to evolve – flexible solutions for unstoppable business growth.
